RT HMCoastguard: RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Check out @BBCTees tonight between 4-6pm when @ScottMakinRadio chats with Sarah Duffy @EnvAgency about the new partnership campaign to keep people safer along the #Redcar #Cleveland coastline ‚ÄúNo #selfie is worth your l‚Ä¶ https://t.co/3U44IY7ZXH

Every single day sees new piles of garbage dumped in the lanes & gateways around my small farm on the urban fringe.

Humanity has a real problem. https://t.co/Fcqt6UwFZM

@WCL_News @RSBenwell @ruthmchambers @Goodwin_Pip @GreenAllianceUK @RSPBNews @GreenerUK_ @DefraGovUK @DefraNature @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @10DowningStreet On water, yes we need an overarching target for the water environment, based on achieving good ecological health in every catchment & water body.  

Focusing on P and N for agri and wastewater is too narrow, would drive narrow solutions. Need to think/act bigger.

It's #Unblocktober! 

Please help to protect the #environment straight after your dinner by following these simple stepsüëâ
 
üü® Pour leftover cooking fats into a heat proof container
        
üü® Leave to cool

üü® Scrape into the food waste or bin

@kendalwiki @EnvAgencyNW @TheFloodHub The Natural Flood Management work is part of the @DefraGovUK programme (¬£15m) that started in 2016 and is due to finish in 2021 - this will then inform future government policy - there is an interim report at https://t.co/fhRyqNxHOv
@stewart_mounsey @EnvAgencyNW @TheFloodHub Curious to know how long you will study it for before doing something?

The weekend storms shifted the shingle at Pett, near #Hastings‚Ä¶

So we‚Äôve been down to put it back and keep land and sea apart‚Ä¶

Flood-protection isn‚Äôt just about hard walls and barriers‚Ä¶ 

Did you know #DavidBowie filmed his #AshestoAshes video at Pett?
#floodaware https://t.co/avUtNAINft
